MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the LL61 postcode area of Llanfairpwllgwyngyll, affecting properties in Bryn Rhedyn and surrounding area.  This is causing reduced power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  6:51 AM. Our engineers have arrived at the local substation and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:15 AM. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:50 AM on 25th October 2020.
